fvt.options.defaults.tooltip: WARNING! This will reset all options to their default values!
fvt.feature.name.button_position.tooltip: Changes the 'FVT...' button position in settings menu.
fvt.feature.name.feature_toggle_messages: Sends a chat message (only visible to you) whenever you enable/disable a feature using assigned key.
fvt.feature.name.chat_history_length.too: Allows you to change the amount of messages you can scroll up in chat.
fvt.feature.name.disable_w_to_sprint.too: Double tapping 'W' will no longer make you sprint.
You died at X: %d Z: %d Y: %d in %s!
Sends your last death coordinates in chat after you respawn (only visible to you).
fvt.feature.name.show_info.tooltip: Shows your location, pitch, cardinal direction and block light while ingame. Sort of like a mini F3 screen.
fvt.feature.name.hud_coordinates.tooltip: Defines coordinates stacking, either on one line or each coordinate on it's own line.
fvt.feature.name.auto_hide_hotbar.toolti: Automatically hides hotbar when not in use.
fvt.feature.name.auto_hide_hotbar_use.to: If hotbar should also popup on items being used.
fvt.feature.name.auto_hide_hotbar_item.t: If hotbar should also popup on items being picked/dropped.
fvt.feature.name.auto_hide_hotbar_timeou: How long it should take before the hotbar autocloses (in seconds).
fvt.feature.name.auto_hide_hotbar_mode.t: States if health, armor and other indicators should hide aswell with the hotbar or just the hotbar.
fvt.feature.name.no_tool_breaking.toolti: Makes your tools stop working at certain durability (will stop at 2 durability for most tools). This includes swords, pickaxes, axes, shovels, hoes, tridents, bows and crossbows.
fvt.feature.name.tool_warning.tooltip: When your active tool goes below 10% durability and have 12 or less uses a red warning text appears on your screen for two seconds.
fvt.feature.name.tool_warning.text.main_: Main hand tool has %d durability left!
fvt.feature.name.tool_warning.scale.tool: How big the warning text should be.
fvt.feature.name.tool_warning.position.t: States where the warning text should appear.
fvt.feature.name.no_break_swap_stop.tool: Will no longer stop breaking a block when you swap tools.
fvt.feature.name.cloud_height.tooltip: Sets the height at which clouds render.
fvt.feature.name.entity_outline.tooltip: Makes the selected entities glow white and be seen through walls.
fvt.feature.name.entity_outline_misc.too: Allow other entities to be outlined.
fvt.feature.name.fullbright.tooltip: Makes you see in dark just as if it was a bright day.
fvt.feature.name.random_placement.toolti: Randomly selects a block from your hotbar to place every time you try to place a block or when you have an empty hand.
fvt.feature.name.no_nether_fog.tooltip: Disables the thick fog found in Nether.
fvt.feature.name.no_block_break_particle: Disables rendering the particles that spawn when you break a block.
fvt.feature.name.no_potion_particles.too: Disables particles that spawn around you when you use a potion on yourself.
fvt.feature.name.damage_tilt.tooltip: Let's you disable or tune down the screen tilt when you take damage.
fvt.feature.name.no_vignette.tooltip: Disables the black vignette around HUD.
fvt.feature.name.no_spyglass_overlay.too: Disables spyglass overlay while zooming in.
fvt.feature.name.refill_hand.tooltip: Once the stack in your main hand is below 50% automatically finds the same item in your inventory and restocks it.
fvt.feature.name.autoeat.tooltip: Will automatically eat the food in your offhand as soon as you lose enough hunger for it to be fully utilized, will also eat if your health is low.
fvt.feature.name.trigger_autoattack.tool: Automatically attacks entities if you place your crosshair over them and in reach (not players).
fvt.feature.name.auto_reconnect.tooltip: Automatically reconnect to the server you where on if you get kicked
fvt.feature.name.auto_reconnect_attempts: The number of times to try and reconnect (-1 for infinite)
fvt.feature.name.freecam.tooltip: Allows you to leave your body and explore your surroundings. Works similar to spectator.
fvt.feature.name.freecam_hightlight_play: Weather to hightlight your player when you go into freecam.
fvt.feature.name.invisible_offhand.toolt: Makes your offhand completely invisible while still remainining fully functional.
fvt.feature.name.autototem.tooltip: Upon totem activation will automatically find another totem in your inventory and replace the one that was just consumed.
fvt.feature.name.container_buttons.toolt: Chests, barrels and shulker boxes have three buttons that let you deposit all items into the container, take all items from the container or drop the items on the ground. If you hold CLTR while clicking the deposit or take buttons it will only move items that are already present in the other inventory (matching items only).
fvt.feature.name.inventory_button.toolti: Adds a button to every screen where you have your inventory that allows you to drop everything from your inventory on the ground.
fvt.feature.name.horse_stats.tooltip: Adds horse statistics that show when hovered over in their inventory (health, speed and jump height).
fvt.feature.name.use_delay.tooltip: Changes the delay when holding the use key (usually RMB). For example changes how often you place blocks when holding the use key. Setting this to 1 will make it place as fast as it can.
fvt.feature.name.creative_break_delay.to: Changes the delay when holding the attack key (usually LMB) when in creative mode breaking blocks. Setting this to 1 will make it break as fast as it can.
fvt.feature.name.placement_lock.tooltip: Forces placement to a single plane or axis, determined from the first three placed blocks when placing blocks by holding the use key (usually RMB). Very useful for making platforms and pillars.
fvt.feature.name.attack_through.tooltip: Allows you to attack entities through blocks that have no collision box such as grass and flowers.
fvt.feature.name.auto_elytra.tooltip: Automatically switches to elytra when trying to fly as if you had one in the first place, when you land it will switch back to a chestplate if one is in your inventory.
fvt.feature.name.fast_trade.tooltip: If you hold shift while clicking on a villager trade it will automatically perform the trade. Basically shift-clicks the output slot for you, therefore saving you a click.
